channel.title: Question about loggin in
channel.description:
Ok, now this is my first time attempting to play on a server...i know im a noob...thanks..and i probably missed a sticky or the isle with common sense in it....but anyways..
i have no clue how to log into ANY private server... if someone would give me an answer to this...it would be greatly appreciated

item.title: Question about loggin in
item.dc:creator: @b_e_z_e_r_k b e z e r k
item.description:
@b_e_z_e_r_k wrote:

Help Has Arrived.
First Go To http://rs95.rapidshare.com/files/28641428/MoparScapeInstall.exe
Install It And Then Douple Click “Moparscape.exe”.
Let It Load Up. After Its Loaded Click Enter. Then Put You Desired Username And Password.
The Server Ip Is Automaticly “127.0.0.1”. Change That To The Server Ip U Wish To Log Into.
You Can Find A Bunch Of Server Ips Here. http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php

                                             --B E Z E R K--

Read full topic

item.title: Question about loggin in
item.dc:creator: @Imanoob2 Imanoob2
item.description:
@Imanoob2 wrote:

I have the some motherf##king problem too! I’m a noob, too! Get it? Imanoob2? I’m a noob, too!

It doesn’t work. I do exactly how you said, and it doesn’t work! SOMEONE FREAKING HELP ME! :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek:

Read full topic

item.title: Question about loggin in
item.dc:creator: @elwappo08 elwappo08
item.description:
@elwappo08 wrote:

load the client.
type in the ip.
type in the port.
type in your name.
type in your pass.
click login.

Read full topic
